mapper.select: SELECT case when gender = 'F' then '여성' else '남성' end as gender, sum(price) as sum, TO_CHAR(rdate, 'YYYY-MM') AS monthly FROM sales WHERE rdate>=TO_DATE('2018-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND rdate<TO_DATE('2025-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(rdate, 'YYYY-MM'), GENDER ORDER BY MONTHLY
